import React, { createRef } from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' function EditModal(props) { const { inputText } = createRef() const multifunc = () => { props.onEditSubmit() props.toggleEditCardName() } return (
×
) } EditModal.propTypes = { editCardName: PropTypes.bool.isRequired, onEditCardName: PropTypes.func.isRequired, onEditSubmit: PropTypes.func.isRequired, activeCard: PropTypes.func.isRequired, toggleEditCardName: PropTypes.func.isRequired } export default EditModal
